<line: 12> SUMMONS IN A CIVIL ACTION

<line: 14> To: (Defendant's name and address) SIONI APPAREL GROUP CORP., a New York Corporation; BURLINGTON COAT
<line: 15> FACTORY DIRECT CORPORATION, a New Jersey Corporation; and DOES 1
<line: 16> through 10,.

[TEXT]
<line: 18> A lawsuit has been filed against you.

[TEXT]
<line: 20> Within 21 days after service of this summons on you (not counting the day you received it) - or 60 days if you
<line: 21> are the United States or a United States agency, or an officer or employee of the United States described in Fed. R. Civ.
<line: 22> P. 12 (a)(2) or (3) - you must serve on the plaintiff an answer to the attached complaint or a motion under Rule 12 of
<line: 23> the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure. The answer or motion must be served on the plaintiff or plaintiff's attorney,

[TEXT]
<line: 25> whose name and address are:.

[TEXT]
<line: 27> Scott A. Burroughs, Esq..
<line: 28> DONIGER BURROUGHS
<line: 29> 603 Rose Avenue
<line: 30> Venice, California 90291

[TEXT]
<line: 32> If you fail to respond, judgment by default will be entered against you for the relief demanded in the complaint
<line: 33> You also must file your answer or motion with the court.

[FIGURE]

[ABANDON]
<line: 36> CLERK OF COURT

<line: 39> 6/27/2016

<line: 10> (This section should not be filed with the court unless required by Fed. R. Civ. P. 4 (l)).

[TEXT]
<line: 12> This summons for (name of individual and title, if any)
<line: 13> was received by me on (date)

[TEXT]
<line: 15>  I personally served the summons on the individual at (place)
<line: 16> on (date)
<line: 17> ; or

[TEXT]
<line: 19>  I left the summons at the individual's residence or usual place of abode with (name)
<line: 20> , a person of suitable age and discretion who resides there,
<line: 21> on (date)
<line: 22> , and mailed a copy to the individual's last known address; or

[TEXT]
<line: 24>  I served the summons on (name of individual)
<line: 25> , who is
<line: 26> designated by law to accept service of process on behalf of (name of organization)
<line: 27> on (date)
<line: 28> ; or

[TEXT]
<line: 30>  I returned the summons unexecuted because
<line: 31> ; or

[TEXT]

<line: 34> for travel and $
<line: 35> for services, for a total of $
